When to go to the doctor? Select any symptoms Accompanied by Cough / Sneeze Fever or chills Headache Sore throat Diarrhoea Conjunctivitis Loss of taste or smell Difficulty breathing Tiredness Runny nose
Clean your hands always. Use soap and water or gel. Safe distance from anyone in public place or public transport. Don´t touch with your hands eyes, nouse or mount. Use mask in concurred places. Cover nouse and mounth with your elbow. Stay at home. If you present any symptoms, call emergency numbers
Instituto Tecnológico de Oaxaca
